channel.title: Great way to Be a tank and low lvl same time!
channel.description:
This is great. (Made it my self)
Well what you will require is pretty simple and easy.
Addy Tanking. - F2P
First get your self addy full helm / med addy plate / chain D hide vamps and chaps Boots power ammy Red cape >.< All those help include boot + cape it adds like + 2 to everything in defence
Ok now get your self 30defence. Now you can do two things stay 30 defence or, you can get 32 defence with out leveling in CB (I recommend that.)
Now 30 attk. For addy scim + 2h.
Now for 50str. Get it.
Get 70range. 50-62 are low recommendations.
Now you are, Aprrox. level 41. With out counting hp.
Counting hp you will be around lvl 45.
This is also with having 1prayer. If you get 31prayers you are at 48 cb. Now get your mage 25. This will not raise cb. Get 25 if your tele noob.
Now your max with 70range = 15 addy arrow 18 runes (If you spec with mage short it is 20with r arrow) K bow = 24 Not bad ehy?
Str at 50 with pot + scimmiy u will only go to 15 :\ With 2h your at 17. Get 60str you have 17 with addy 18 with 2h. If your plain at 50str it is 14with scim 15with 2h, If you pot at 60 you will 18 addy 20 2h. If you get 40attk u will be with 15r scim non pot 19 with pot 2h non is 21 potted is 23 with pray r2h = 25!
Max u hit with mage is a 8
Now you will pretty much kill in pking at lvl 46!!! Or 50 depends
I think u will come out 2 lvl 58cb with all. Good luck on your ownage!

item.title: Great way to Be a tank and low lvl same time!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:10, topic:137429”][quote author=pko link=topic=188999.msg1713669#msg1713669 date=1188439568]
Sound it out with me its Fu…Ck… and Y…ou.

LEAVE NAO

[/quote]
Bi…T.cH U blow me then ill leave fat ass.[/quote]
How the fuck would you know if he’s fat dumbass.
And what 1337h4x said; I agree.
Stop flooding the forums with bullshit; uder bullshit.
And pko if you don’t like the tutorial, don’t posi in it.

And pk4pk, if he’s fat, and you wrote a tutorial on a game, imagine what you would be.
All I’m saying is, do you know he’s fat? No.
So get the hell off these forums; you are not wanted.
Nor you pko.

Read full topic
